question: 1. Which of the following can an AWS customer use to launch a new Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS) cluster? (Select TWO)
2. Which of the following Reserved Instance (RI) pricing models provides the highest average savings compared to On-Demand pricing?

choices.A: One-year, No Upfront, Standard RI pricing.
choices.B: One-year, All Upfront, Convertible RI pricing.
choices.C: Three-year, All Upfront, Standard RI pricing.
choices.D: Three-year, No Upfront, Convertible RI pricing.

question: 3. Which of the following are features of Amazon CloudWatch Logs? (Select TWO)

choices.A: Summaries by Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS).

question: 4. Which of the following is an AWS-managed compute service?
5. A company wants to reduce the physical compute footprint that developers use to run code. Which service would meet that need by enabling serverless architectures?
6. Which of the following is the customer’s responsibility under the AWS shared responsibility model?
7. According to the AWS shared responsibility model who is responsible for configuration management?

choices.A: It is solely the responsibility of the customer.
choices.B: It is solely the responsibility of AWS.
choices.C: It is shared between AWS and the customer.
choices.D: It is not part of the AWS shared responsibility model.

question: 8. Which security service automatically recognizes and classifies sensitive data or intellectual property on AWS?
9. Which of the following BEST describe the AWS pricing model? (Select TWO)
10. Under the shared responsibility model, which of the following tasks are the responsibility of the AWS customer? (Select TWO)

choices.A: Ensuring that application data is encrypted at rest.
choices.B: Ensuring that AWS NTP servers are set to the correct time.
choices.C: Ensuring that users have received security training in the use of AWS services.
choices.D: Ensuring that access to data centers is restricted.
choices.E: Ensuring that hardware is disposed of properly.

question: 11. A customer is using multiple AWS accounts with separate billing. How can the customer take advantage of volume discounts with minimal impact to the AWS resources?

choices.A: Create one global AWS account and move all AWS resources to that account.
choices.B: Sign up for three years of Reserved Instance pricing up front.
choices.C: Use the consolidated billing feature from AWS Organizations.
choices.D: Sign up for the AWS Enterprise support plan to get volume discounts.

question: 12. Which Amazon EC2 pricing model offers the MOST significant discount when compared to OnDemand Instances?

choices.A: A Partial Upfront Reserved Instances for a 1-year term.
choices.B: All Upfront Reserved instances for a 1 year form.
choices.C: All Upfront Reserved Instances for a 3 year term.
choices.D: No Upfront Reserved Instances for a 3 year term.

question: 13. Which AWS services should be used for read/write of constantly changing data? (Select TWO)
14. Which AWS service allows users to identify the changes made to a resource over time?
15. According to best practices, how should an application be designed to run in the AWS Cloud?
16. Which benefits are included with the AWS Business Support plan? (Select TWO)

choices.A: 24/7 assistance by way of live chat or a telephone call.
choices.B: Support from a dedicated AWS Technical Account Manager.
choices.C: An unlimited number of cases and contacts.
choices.D: 15-minute response time for production system interruption cases.
choices.E: Annual operational reviews with AWS Solutions Architects.

question: 17. Which of the following is an AWS managed Domain Name System (DNS) web service?
18. A user must meet compliance and software licensing requirements that state a workload must be hosted on a physical server. When Amazon EC2 instance pricing option will meet these requirements?
19. Which of the Reserved Instance (RI) pricing models can change the attributes of the RI as long as the exchange results in the creation of RIs of equal or greater value?
20. Which service is best for storing common database query results, which helps to alleviate database access load?
21. When should a company consider using Amazon EC2 Spot Instances? (Select TWO)

choices.C: For applications that cannot have interruptions.

question: 22. Which AWS tools assist with estimating costs? (Select three)

choices.D: AWS Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) Calculator.

question: 23. A company wants to focus on business activities instead of managing compute and capacity. Which AWS service can be used to automatically add or remove Amazon EC2 instances based on demand?
24. Which is the minimum AWS Support plan that includes Infrastructure Event Management without additional costs?
25. Access keys in AWS Identity and Access Management (IM1) are used to:

choices.A: Log in to the AWS Management Console.
choices.B: Make programmatic calls to AWS from AWS APIs.
choices.C: Log in to Amazon EC2 instances.

question: 26. Which AWS service can be used to query stored datasets directly from Amazon S3 using standard SQL?
27. How does AWS shorten the time to provision IT resources?

choices.A: It supplies an online IT ticketing platform for resource requests.
choices.B: It supports automatic code validation services.
choices.C: It provides the ability to programmatically provision existing resources.
choices.D: It automates the resource request process from a company’s IT vendor list.

question: 28. Which AWS services can be used to gather information about AWS account activity? (Select TWO)
29. Which of the following are characteristics of Amazon S3? (Select TWO)
30. A user wants guidance on possible savings when migrating from on-premises to AWS. Which tool is suitable for this scenario?

choices.C: AWS Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) Calculator.

question: 31. Which of the following services is in the category of AWS serverless platform?
32. The use of what AWS feature or service allows companies to track and categorize spending on a detailed level?
33. Which of the following inspects AWS environments to find opportunities that can save money for users and also improve system performance?
34. Web servers running on Amazon EC2 access a legacy application running in a corporate data center. What term would describe this model?
35. What technology enables compute capacity to adjust as loads change?
36. Which AWS service is a managed NoSQL database?
37. Which of the following is a correct relationship between regions, Availability Zones, and edge locations?
38. What approach to transcoding a large number of individual video files adheres to AWS architecture principles?

choices.B: Using a single large instance during off-peak hours.
choices.D: Using a large GPU instance type.

question: 39. Which AWS services can host a Microsoft SQL Server database? (Select TWO)
40. Which AWS IAM feature allows developers to access AWS services through the AWS CLI?
41. The user is fully responsible for which action when running workloads on AWS?

choices.D: Implementing controls to route application traffic.

question: 42. Which AWS support plan includes a dedicated Technical Account Manager?
43. What time-savings advantage is offered with the use of Amazon Rekognition?

choices.A: Amazon Rekognition provides automatic watermarking of images.
choices.B: Amazon Rekognition provides automatic detection of objects appearing in pictures.
choices.C: Amazon Recognition provides the ability to resize millions of images automatically.
choices.D: Amazon Rekognition uses Amazon Mechanical Turk to allow humans to bid on object detection jobs.

question: 44. Which AWS service can be used to automatically scale an application up and down without making capacity planning decisions?
45. Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS) offers which of the following benefits over traditional database management?

choices.A: AWS manages the data stored in Amazon RDS tables.
choices.B: AWS manages the maintenance of the operating system.
choices.C: AWS automatically scales up instance types on demand.

question: 46. A company’s web application currently has light dependencies on underlying components so when one component fails the entire web application fails. Applying which AWS Cloud design principle will address the current design issue?

choices.A: Implementing elasticity enabling the application to scale up or scale down as demand changes.
choices.B: Enabling several EC2 instances to run in parallel to achieve better performance.
choices.C: Focusing on decoupling components by isolating them and ensuring individual components can function when other components.
choices.D: Doubling EC2 computing resources to increase system fault tolerance.

question: 47. A customer would like to design and build a new workload on AWS Cloud but does not have the AWS-related software technical expertise in-house. Which of the following AWS programs can a customer take advantage of to achieve that outcome?
48. Which service stores objects, provides real-time access to those objects, and offers versioning and lifecycle capabilities?
49. Distributing workloads across multiple Availability Zones supports which cloud architecture design principle?
50. Which service should a customer use to consolidate and centrally manage multiple AWS accounts?
